resources.string: How To Play The Game!
Kamora The Alien
You are in control of an Alien called Kamora, a leader on the planet of Aromak.
It is your job to control him through each level, to do this, use the left and right on-screen controls.
(swipe left for the next slide)
The left hand controls controls Kamora\'s left and right movements.
As you make your way through the levels, you will certainly run into Aromak Police. They have turned evil and are now set against Aromak\'s leaders (that\'s you).
The "up" button does the jumping.
The "right" button will shoot bullets (your energy needs a second to recharge, so use it wisely).
(swipe right for the previous slide)
These police can show up any time, so you gotta be on your guard. They will shoot their energy ions at you, and don\'t bump into them either!
You have 6 lives to get you through, your life is displayed at the top of the screen.
You can regenerate your life bu collecting certain items throughout the levels.
As well as the police, there are harmful items along the way, watch out for these as they\'ll take your life.
Along the way, there are items you should collect, for every 100 points you get, your life bar will fill.
If at any time you want to pause the game, hit the button.

The bonus levels are powered by the accelerometer on your phone. That means to move Kamora, you need to tilt your phone. It will also be on a time limit, which will get more challenging as you progress through the game, so make sure you learn to control him.
This app was created by Kiera O\'Reilly as a final year project. It is a combination of a game engine for Android - Andengine, and pure Android code.
